Write-Up Text: The social media activity of various people highlights diverse viewpoints on the Australian federal budget. While the $20 per week increment in JobSeeker did not impress unemployed Melbournian Jez Heywood a petition calling for the government to tackle invasive species has gained significant traction. Max criticizes Labor's housing policy the Federal budget and calls for the Greens to support those struggling to secure a roof over their heads. Meanwhile Tandem welcomes the budget's focus on helping Australia's most vulnerable while noting that mental health caregivers and supporting families remain unrecognized. Finally the IPA's Daniel Wild believes that the budget fails to cater to those experiencing rising inflation energy costs and mortgage repayment rates.
